-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | An interface to the pushover.net API.
--   
--   Please see the README on GitHub at
--   <a>https://github.com/dustin/pushover-hs#readme</a>
@package pushover-hs
@version 0.1.0.0


-- | This is an interface to Pushover.net.
module Network.API.Pushover

-- | Send a message.
sendMessage :: Message -> IO (Either Response Response)

-- | Get the Receipt for an emergency message.
getReceipt :: Text -> Text -> IO (Either String Receipt)

-- | Build a message with defaults given an API Token, User ID, and initial
--   message.
message :: Text -> Text -> Text -> Message

-- | An Emergency PriorityLevel with default EmergencyParams.
emergency :: PriorityLevel

-- | eparams gets or sets emergency parameters through a PriorityLevel
--   (which may or may not be an Emergency).
eparams :: Lens' PriorityLevel (Maybe EmergencyParams)
retry :: Lens' EmergencyParams Int
expire :: Lens' EmergencyParams Int
callback :: Lens' EmergencyParams Text
tags :: Lens' EmergencyParams Text

-- | A message to be sent via <a>sendMessage</a>.
data Message
Message :: Text -> Text -> Text -> ByteString -> Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> PriorityLevel -> Sound -> Maybe UTCTime -> Message
[_token] :: Message -> Text
[_user] :: Message -> Text
[_body] :: Message -> Text
[_attachment] :: Message -> ByteString
[_device] :: Message -> Text
[_title] :: Message -> Text
[_url] :: Message -> Text
[_urlTitle] :: Message -> Text
[_priority] :: Message -> PriorityLevel
[_sound] :: Message -> Sound
[_timestamp] :: Message -> Maybe UTCTime

-- | Priority levels for a notification.
data PriorityLevel
VeryLow :: PriorityLevel
Low :: PriorityLevel
Normal :: PriorityLevel
High :: PriorityLevel
Emergency :: EmergencyParams -> PriorityLevel
data Sound
None :: Sound
Bike :: Sound
Bugle :: Sound
CashRegister :: Sound
Classical :: Sound
Cosmic :: Sound
Falling :: Sound
GameLAN :: Sound
Incoming :: Sound
Intermission :: Sound
Magic :: Sound
Mechanical :: Sound
PianoBar :: Sound
Siren :: Sound
SpaceAlarm :: Sound
Tugboat :: Sound
Alien :: Sound
Climb :: Sound
Persistent :: Sound
Echo :: Sound
UpDown :: Sound
token :: Lens' Message Text
user :: Lens' Message Text
body :: Lens' Message Text
attachment :: Lens' Message ByteString
device :: Lens' Message Text
title :: Lens' Message Text
url :: Lens' Message Text
urlTitle :: Lens' Message Text
priority :: Lens' Message PriorityLevel
sound :: Lens' Message Sound

-- | The response to a <a>sendMessage</a> request.
data Response
Response :: Int -> Text -> Text -> [Text] -> Response
[_status] :: Response -> Int
[_request] :: Response -> Text
[_receipt] :: Response -> Text
[_errors] :: Response -> [Text]
status :: Lens' Response Int
request :: Lens' Response Text
receipt :: Lens' Response Text
errors :: Lens' Response [Text]

-- | An acknowledgment of an emergency message.
data Acknowledgment
Acknowledgment :: UTCTime -> Text -> Text -> Acknowledgment
[_ackAt] :: Acknowledgment -> UTCTime
[_ackBy] :: Acknowledgment -> Text
[_ackOn] :: Acknowledgment -> Text

-- | Receipt represents the current status of receipt of an emergency
--   message.
data Receipt
Receipt :: Maybe Acknowledgment -> Maybe UTCTime -> Bool -> Maybe UTCTime -> Maybe UTCTime -> Receipt
[_acknowledged] :: Receipt -> Maybe Acknowledgment
[_lastDeliveredAt] :: Receipt -> Maybe UTCTime
[_expired] :: Receipt -> Bool
[_expiresAt] :: Receipt -> Maybe UTCTime
[_calledBackAt] :: Receipt -> Maybe UTCTime
ackAt :: Lens' Acknowledgment UTCTime
ackBy :: Lens' Acknowledgment Text
ackOn :: Lens' Acknowledgment Text
acknowledged :: Lens' Receipt (Maybe Acknowledgment)
calledBackAt :: Lens' Receipt (Maybe UTCTime)
expired :: Lens' Receipt Bool
expiresAt :: Lens' Receipt (Maybe UTCTime)
lastDeliveredAt :: Lens' Receipt (Maybe UTCTime)
parseResponse :: ByteString -> Either Response Response
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.API.Pushover.Receipt
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.API.Pushover.Receipt
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.API.Pushover.Receipt
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.API.Pushover.Receipt
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.API.Pushover.Acknowledgment
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.API.Pushover.Acknowledgment
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.API.Pushover.Acknowledgment
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.API.Pushover.Response
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.API.Pushover.Response
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.API.Pushover.Response
instance Data.Default.Class.Default Network.API.Pushover.Message
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.API.Pushover.PriorityLevel
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.API.Pushover.PriorityLevel
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.API.Pushover.PriorityLevel
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.API.Pushover.Sound
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.API.Pushover.Sound
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.API.Pushover.Message
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.API.Pushover.Message
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.API.Pushover.EmergencyParams
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.API.Pushover.EmergencyParams
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.API.Pushover.EmergencyParams
